channel.title: Problem whit making animation for NPC's
channel.description:
I am using mtp 634 source from marcbob but if i attack a npc after i spawn it, it sas This NPC is not attackable, plelas post it in bug reports.If you have the animations for attacking, blocking, and dying, it'd also be a plus. Thanks :-)
HOW CAN I GET THIS AWAY??? i got nomad fixed but if i try npc 11752 (behemoth) it gives that sentence again.
pleas help me
